content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog around 9 at night when i looked up at the stars i i always do  i can point out mars and jupiter when i saw two orange orbs moving to the north not real fast but fast enough that it caught my attention.  one orb went straight up which looked like it headed east but it got smaller and smaller till it was gone like it left the atmosphere .With only one orb remaining it stopped the it to went straight up but not after hanging around a min like it was watching me the it to went straight up and it got smaller and smaller and it was gone i turn to go home still looking up and around when i turn around it was back no man made object can move that fast with out making noise i believe that i have been a witness to a ufo with it still hoveringbi ran home to get binoculars and my phone to get a photo of it i told my dad what i saw we went out back and looked in tje last direction and it was gone i know the government is coving this up we are not alone
content.summary: Noticed 2orange orbs in sky made no noise

content.detailedDescription: On the night of may 17 i was walking my friends dog,walking to first corner of lindermann ave @ hayes ave when to the north over a house appeared 2 orbs bright as a fireball, u could not miss them. then i took the dog back to friends garage, to get my friend to come outside. we both went out to observe the orbs in the alley. then 2 more orbs appeared, then 2 more appeared over the houses flying towards the east towards a cemetary before scattering in different direction and flying up in to space. i was a little scared at first until i got my friend he was scared also, they made no sounds at all no blinking lights, the orbs stayed same color at all the time.  my friend stated he saw 5 orbs.
content.summary: Was walking a friends dog,when to the north i spotted 2 orbs flying above house, then 2 more appeared @2 more appeared after that

content.detailedDescription: I am a amateur photographer and have been taking landscapes for 20 years. i was out taking some shots of f3 tornado damage in blountsville, al on 5/5/2011 and did not realize what i had captured till after i returned home to go thru my shots. i have taken pictures of birds, planes and have had many objects in photos before but not like this. this is not dust or any other object in my optics or camera. another thing that was odd at the time was a blackhawk helicopter flying south, to the west of my location at the same time this photo of the ufo was taken to the east. i am very aware of my surroundings and there were no planes in the area at the time. i will post 2 pictures of the uh60 blackhawk close and at a distance and you can clearly see what it is. as for the other object it looks closer and does not resemble a bird or plane. i sent the pics at full size and un-edited but, if you need a zoomed in view let me know. thanks for your time, mike miller
content.summary: Picture-ufo blount county alabama

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer month of 1978 (june or july), myself and three friends were cardboard sliding down a grassy hill near my house. we were all 11 to 12 at the time and we were having a great time. it was a warm, clear, sunny day and there were no clouds or airplanes in the area. as we slid down the hill, about halfway down there was a wire fence that would stop us from sliding all the way down the hill. the four of us were sitting at the fence, talking after another trip down the hill when one of us, i believe it was mike, looked up in the sky and said, "whoa, check that out." we looked up to where he was pointing and saw the most unbelievable thing i've ever experienced. a massive fireball was in the sky above our heads. it was probably the size of two football fields in length and the width of one football field. it was huge and about 1000 feet above us. the flames seemed to be continually generating, not burning out, but continuing to burn as if there was an endless supply of fuel. it reminded me of a huge explosion fireball. unbelievable. 

we stared at the fireball, exclaiming how unreal it looked, wondering if planes had collided in mid-flight. it couldn't have been because there was no explosion and the fireball was silent and void of any falling debris. after about five minutes the real fireworks began. from each end of the fireball came elliptical-shaped flying objects. they were shiny, looking like stainless steel material. they didn't have wings and were shaped like eggs. they shot across the sky in opposite directions, disappearing over the opposite horizons in a matter of seconds, yet they made no sound. i have since worked on several engineering projects on military bases and i have seen fighter jets take off and fly across the sky at high speeds. these two elliptical ufo's were way faster than any of these fighter planes and with the fighter jets, they always make loud roars as they tear across the sky. these ufo's made no sound whatsoever. we stared for the next couple minutes, wondering if the ufo's would come back, also watching the huge fireball, burning as bright as it had when we first saw it. after a couple minutes we saw both ufo's approaching from the north, flying close to each other as they sped across the sky, when they both suddenly made 90-degree turns in opposite directions, one to the west and one to the east. they then made several more directional changes, doing things that no airplane or helicopter could ever do, at speeds that defied modern avionics. left turns, turns straight up or straight down, all while traveling at high speeds and all turns were made on a dime - almost right angle turns and change of directions. we couldn't believe what we were seeing. this mid-air aerial acrobatics continued for the next 5 minutes before the two ufo's once again disappeared over opposite horizons, one north and the other south. 

it was another five minutes before we saw them again. just as we thought they were gone, they reappeared and came straight at each other in a high-speed game of chicken. as they got close enough to crash into each other they both turn 180 degrees and shot off away from each other. we assumed they were going to disappear over the horizons again, but they both shot back toward each other and got close to each other, hovering about 500 feet away from the massive fireball. and then the most unbelievable part of this story happened. it was all unbelievable to this point, but then one of the ufo's emitted a light beam toward the other ufo. it was like the one shot a bright white bolt of electricity at the other. it was a direct hit and the other ufo went from shiny like stainless steel to a dull grey, as if it had lights earlier that had just been turned off. and then we stood in disbelief as the ufo that had just been shot with the bolt of light, fell from the sky, straight down, disappearing over the mountains to our west. the other ufo then flashed four white lights, in a circular sequence and then it shot straight up, disappearing in the blink of an eye. it was there and then gone in less than a second. unreal. we all screamed in disbelief, unable to process what our young minds had just witnessed. 

when then turned our attention to the fireball, hoping to see more ufo's flying out of it, but what happened next was the fireball began to fade. this fireball that seemed to have an endless supply of fuel earlier was now burning out. it took about five minutes before the massive fireball was completely gone and the experience was over. i swear to my god in heaven this story is all true. i have often thought of hiking to the area in the mountains where the one ufo went down, but for some reason i have never gone. i would like to someday, but i'm sure there is private property issues and living in sonoma county a person needs to be careful about hiking in the hills on their own. (marijuana growers). 

we had one of my friend's mother call to see if there were any air shows or other training things going on that day, and she said they told her there were no aircraft in the area. i can't confirm if she actually called anyone or not, but i know what i saw that day. i have only told a few people about this over the years, for fear of being laughed at or called a liar, but i would sit for a lie-detector test anytime and would pass. this really happened.
content.summary: Two crafts fly out of each end of a large fire ball

content.detailedDescription:
Well after a friday night of having a get together on the morning of april 5th, 2014 in the san bernardino county mountains, two of my friends an i were 
up around 3:45 in the morning having a smoke when we noticed the unidentified 
flying object. i have always been interested in the idea of ufo's and had never before seen one personally. so naturally at first we all thought maybe it was a helicopter with a search light hovering over the tree line. we had never seen this before either so we all thought it was just a little odd. so we kept our eye on it for a bit and we noticed it was moving very fast then slowing to a hover. i noticed the light it was emitting was like no other light i have ever seen in my life. i have seen many different types of aircraft since i have a background in the u.S. military. i have never seen an aircraft make those kind's of movements to then come to an immediate stop then completely change direction. the light we all watched that the craft was emitting made distinct pointed edges in the light, as if i were looking through a dirty windshield. the light also had distinct color, like a blend of yellow, white, and orange. this continued on for over an hour, the aircraft was sort of floating around and changing direction on a dime. we were so enamored with this whole event, it felt like we didn't blink for the whole hour an a half we watched this thing kind of just hang around. the whole time we were waiting for the craft to kind of dart off or disappear in front of our eyes like we have seen on other ufo video's. but the sun started to come up and it just slowly started to blend in with the rising dawn. i am shocked i witnessed this event. but pleased to see it for myself.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very obvious by the direction changes it was not a conventional aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I do not remember the date or year.  it happened in the summer when i was a young child (about 1972-1973).  i was outside with my dad (deceased).  i saw a round object that looked like the moon was on fire.  i asked dad why the moon was on fire.  after a moment he looked up and saw it.  after a few minutes, it very rapidly (like a flash of lighting) fly to the horizon, circled the horizon and disappeared to the southeast.   dad got the number for the nasa tracking station in rosman, nc and described the event.  rosman said that the did not see anything..  i do know that within a few minutes jets, and later helicopters were all over the area. and searched along the path dad told rosman.  to help with directions, face south.  i first saw the ufo at 1:00.  it flew to the horizon, circled the horizon and disappeared around 11:00.
content.summary: Red orange circle

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my home observing the sky because i see uefo frequently here on this area. that day i was observing and north of my home i see a very big object on the form of a triangle, with 4 red lights on each side flying about 2 or 3 miles away to slow i hear no noise. i was amazing because i was able to see that object. i called my neighbors and we see the object for about 20 or 30 minutes until he disappeared. south west of the place were we see the object. look like he disappeared by the are of santa barbara ca. my feelings were that i was amazing because i told the neighbors that i see those things on the sky very frequently, they look at me like saying this guy is mental disable or what that day they told me that they see sometimes things on the sky, but they don't believe on those things until that day we see that uefo. unfortunately i don't have camera or a phone to tape that object.
content.summary: Triangle very big 4 blinking red lights at each side

content.detailedDescription:
Towing my sons car home on back road . looked  toward my right and noticed a silver object  through the treetops. my first thought was.'.I see you. i looked back to the road as to stay driving straight.. i kept searching for it through treetops and it was gone.
the object was just there in the sky, no movement, no nothing. i was intrigued by seeing this solid silver object just sitting there in the sky..
this the second time i have observed an object in general area of airport except this time i was on the other side closer to lakeside. but as a crow flys i would figure same general area in sky.
content.summary: Bright solid silver metal looking upside down teardrop  shape

content.detailedDescription: On 5/13/14 at approximately 1600 hours i observed an object in san jose ca near highway 237. the object was a sphere or orb, white and semi translucent. the object appeared no bigger than a soccer ball. the shape was very clean, not distorted, a perfect orb or spherical shape. i first assumed the object to be a plastic bag or seagull but the object stopped in midair in what appeared to be 15 ��� 25 mph winds heading south by south east. the object was at an altitude higher than a six story building but lower than the aircraft taking off at the nearby san jose airport. several commercial aircraft, 2 or 3 mostly 737s were visible during this time. the object moved in an erratic behavior dropping 50 ��� 60 ft and then climbing vertical another 50 ��� 60 ft. the object moved right to left in a 50 yard area and then suddenly headed south and vertical in an upward motion at a speed much faster than the surrounding aircraft, birds, or insects that i observed. another way to characterize the speed, i have worked closely with f-18 hornets and have never seen them capable of travelling at this speed. i doubted my observation several times thinking it could be a plastic bag, a bird, a drone, an insect, or even a piece of flying pollen. none of the above items match the flight characteristics that this odd craft showed as it seemed intelligently controlled, capable of stopping and moving about in any direction, at any speed despite the winds. there were no visible clouds, no light shining on the windows of the building that i observed the object through. i have never seen anything like it. there was no visible propulsion system, jet intake, propellers, or anything that would indicate the power source this craft used to move about. if i had not been staring where i was at that exact moment i never would have seen it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White semi translucent orb, extreme speed, hovering, and extreme maneuvers.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on a bench in the middle of town staring at the sky when i saw over 30 sphere like objects in the night sky. i laid there for about 3 hours in awe just watching them go in and out of one another.They were doing figure eights and amazing circles in a concentrated part of the sky. no one ever believed me so i didn't report it. but i felt like they knew i was watching so they gave me an amazing show. they faded as the sun started to rise.
content.summary: I was laying out on a bench in the middle of town staring at the sky when i saw over 30 sphere objects in the night sky,i laid there for hours in awe.

content.detailedDescription: Would not like to disclose any info until i'm contacted by someone. but i will say that we see them all the time and it is not uncommon to see then for a few days in a row. this is not a joke
content.summary: My father and i see them all the time.

content.detailedDescription:
I had been working in sacramento. got a job in burne so my boyfriend , myself and his brother pack up on oct. 11, 1992 and headed for burne. we had agreed between us that we would alwayss keep each others car lights within seeing distance so we would not get seperated. when we headed for burne from redding we are going into the mountains. we agreed to stop at a little store that we knew stayed open really late to get something to drink. well, i was the middle car, my boyfriend was driving the uhual behind me and his brother in his car ahead of me. we were maybe one mile from the store and as i rounded one curve this red orange huge circle came right at me from about 200ft above me. i couldn't see the road. i thought i was goingto drive off the cliff on my right side. i slowed to a crawl but i didn't want stop because i was scared. i looked for the lights of the uhaul that was suppose to be behind me but they weren't there. i started crying. i was alone and could not see the road. then as quick as it came it was gone. i looked through my windows to see if i could see where it was. but i couldn't. i went on down to the store and the brother was drinking a soda leaning against his car. when i got out of the car he ask me what happened. he said he had been waiting for 15 min already. he ask where my boyfriend was and i said i don't know. it was another 15min before he showed up. now this is where it got weird. it wasn't until the next morning that i rememered what happened. i sat straight up in bed and my boyfriend ask me what was wrong and i ask him did anything unusual happen to him on the way to that store and he said no. he ask me why and i couldn't tell him because i was scared. i have lived with this fear since then. i'm not normally a scared person but when it comes to this, i start crying. i talked to my parent 6months later and was told to keep it too myself for the time being. this is the first time i have told anyone else. what happened to me those 15min.?
i have moved many times because i don't want them to find me. why do i think this way? i don't know because i don't know what really happened once i could not see the road. i seriously thought the thing was going to hit me. it came right at my front car window. i live by myself andevery time i hear thunder or see lightening i become uneasy and afraid. i don't know why.
content.summary: Heading to burne from redding i thought it was going to hit me and i lost 15minutes

content.detailedDescription: It was about noon monday may 12th 2014 noticed object in the southwest part of the sky at a altitude that their should have been a contrails in the sky behind it when to take a photo of it when it just disappeared.  i've seen other strange things in the skies in arizona.
content.summary: Noticed something in the sky and wonder why no contrails and noticed was no air plane. cigar shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
These are stories as told by my father to me in the late 50's thru the mid 80's.  please do not dismiss this, read all before judging.

the reason i am writing, as i have seen many ufo's, is because i watch all the ufo shows, hanger 1, files, ect. as i am a fan of space and what is out there.  i believe that there is life out in the universe, and aliens have been here, and still are around today.  i was watching a show on the germans in ww 2, about the rockets.  the part about the german rocket engineers coming here after the war, namely werner van braun.  my dad worked with him.  my dad said he worked for chrysler missile.  he did, and i have pics somewhere with van brawn and my dad working on blueprints of some rockets. my dads name and credentials can be seen on a follow up.

my dad was employed by the us gov, i believe now, black opps, and the tacom and atac were his cover.  he would get phone calls in the middle of the night, and i would hear him say " i'm not going to 51 tonight" and then a few minutes later he would leave the house for weeks. my dad was always going to cape canaveral, houston, montgomery al., and always flying to nevada.  sometimes he would take mom and me for a vacation, but when we got there he was never around.  mom said dad was working.

my dads brothers also worked for the us gov, very secret, there was also a man named martin van braun, not sure if that's right name.  i overheard at a family christmas party, that the race to the moon was not to be the russians there, but to beat the russians to the crash site on the moon. ?????  something was on the moon before us. many items came back from the apollo missions besides rocks !! lots of crazy stories between my dad and his brothers when they thought the "kids" were asleep.

i asked my dad a couple of times if there were ufo's, he just looked at me and smiled.  he did once say the reason of allot of "sightings" around military bases and nuclear power plants was for our "own" protection. aliens didn't need to refuel, they were wacthing for mistakes and to make sure we didn't blow up the planet. aliens don't want nukes in space.

from everything i have heard, i believe aliens and ufo's have always been around.  i do not think they would harm us on purpose, just the opposite.

van braun told my dad once that he had "special help" with the v2 rocket and the yaw problems. have you ever seen picture of a redstone rocket with atlas boosters???  i have a pic maybe.  my dad didn't want nukes on redstones, so "they" came up with the polaris rocket.

hey i am sure you get lots of crazies stories.  i just thought you should know some of this, just file this, or contact me if you want.
content.summary: Moon crash

content.detailedDescription: On the night of may 10th, i was attending a party near westphalia, mo and just hanging out with my friends. when suddenly one of them pointed out something weird in the storm that was approaching our area. i looked up and observed what looked like oval lights flying around erratically among the clouds. this was at night so their lighting (if that's what it's called) was more noticeable. when i first saw it, i just thought it was the lightning that was flashing fairly frequently among the storm. but i quickly dismissed this upon further observation due to the circular/oval shape of the lights. i then wondered if it was the dj's lights somehow shining up into the sky, again this was also quickly dismissed due to the dj being at a completely different angle and being inside of a garage. i wish i had a more complete and clear description of the objects, but i was being distracted quite often at the time (being 18, the women talking to me took first priority) however, i was able to notice a couple things. first, they were oval in shape and were lit up. second, there was around 4 total objects observed, but they weren't all always together at one given time, with some fading out and coming back later. thirdly, they seemed to be flying in some sort of circular formation, sticking together for the most part. as far as how i felt, i wasn't worried or anything that's for sure. this is probably the 5th or 6th time i've witnessed a ufo out here in mid missouri in the past couple years and this was just another one i happened to see. i merely observed the objects and did not attempt to pursue them. however after some time, it appeared as if the storm changed directions, sparing the party of a rainstorm and causing me and my friends to lose sight of the objects. we all just went back to the party and didn't think twice about them. however, i was just watching your tv show hangar 1: the ufo files and it reminded me of the incident and i decided to report it. if i get any further sightings out here in mid missouri i will make sure to report them as well.
content.summary: Multiple flashing oval lights flying around among a storm cloud at night

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, i was watching television and it was around 10:00 pm. i noticed a big object outside my window that was oval-shaped with red lights. i thought it might have just been a helicopter or airplane, but this object/aircraft didn't make any noise whatsoever with only red lights, and no one was out on the streets, crickets weren't even making noise. it was just hovering over a building outside my window, slowly moving west. i blinked my eye just once and it looked like it became shorter/far away. it then sped up and tilted on it's side and went pass the full moon light. my feelings were quite shocked, i didn't know what to think of the object and i was just thinking to myself what aircraft could that possibly be. i lost sight of the object when it passed by the moonlight and pass far ahead west.
content.summary: It appeared to be a huge ufo at first, but in a blink of an eye it became shorter. it was long oval type shape with red lights that would come on......Then come off. it was transparent when it went pass the full moon, but the lights were opaque.

content.detailedDescription: Three circular objects flew right over me, they made no sound. they were the same color and/ pattern, like swirled fudge ice cream. they were, as far as i could tell, internally lit.It was a still night where i was is in the corner of a parking lot. i had been there for a while. i was, as usual looking at the stars. then, three circular objects flew directly over me. i am not prone to hallucinations. i am too honest to get elected'
content.summary: 3 circular objects flew directly over me, no sound same size, same color,

content.detailedDescription:
it was about 3am or 3:30 i left my house by way of walking to get a ciggerate at friends house about 5 blocks out of my neighborhood. a total of 
8 blocks counting 3 blocks out montalvin manor my nighborhood.It was the first block out the neighbor hood on san pablo ave inwhich i remember i couldnt see the stars but what was obvious was directly above me may partially because its huge dark triangular massive size had a red round glow in the center of it something also made me feel it new i was watching almost as if it wanted me to  witness it. my first thought was to stop walking clear my eyes and be as silent as possible for the not because i was scared but because i wanted to hear something from it. even as huge and slow as it was going, it was silent. i new exactly what i was witnessing.I never once let my eyes go from the object looking untill it stayed on its path going north east slowly disappearing over the next neighborhood homes.It was as big as a football field at least. the moment i lost complete view, from the u.F.O i told myself wow  i was so pleased to actually have witness such a site. i then turned a complete 360 degree circle in the middle of the avenue hopping    i was not the only witness but it seemed only for my viewing. i new it was going to be hard to convince any others but even explaining and showing with the hair standing on my arms what i no i clearly seen i was told i'm crazy.   it's been well over a year but thanks to finally talking to one of my uncle's who also had clear sightings i recently talked with and both shared i thought to share my experience with you, mufo itwas a genuine clear u.F.O. sighting.
content.summary: It was a huge triangle shape with a round red glow at a dead silent movement about 200 250 ft. directly above me i view it untill it passed over

content.detailedDescription: My sister was visiting so we took her out on the boat for an evening boat ride down the intracoastal waterway. we discussed the orange orbs i had reported to mufon a few weeks ago, so naturally our eyes were on the sky. the first sighting was about 9pm..I,.My sister, brother in law, wife and daughter all witnessed seeing them. there were the three orange orbs appearing higher in the sky than the last time we saw them...About 60 degrees. this time they were only there for a few seconds...Not long enough for me to get the camera and grab a shot of them. the next time we saw them it was at 10:03 pm. again we all saw them, three orange orbs...Very bright and just a little lower in the sky. this time they stayed for around 5 seconds. again not long enough to snap a photo. we were amazed by seeing them twice. on the way back to the marina i had my daughter keep the camera on the sky. we were all busy talking when she screamed and pointed....We did not get tonsee what she saw. she described it as the same type of orange orb, just one this time. in approximately the same position as the last sighting but with one big difference. she said it appeared as all of the others did but instead of just disappearing as the others did, this one flew straight down very fast but leaving no trail like a tail you would see from a shooting star. no trail as it disappeared behind the trees on the horizon. she was freaking out just as bad as she did two weeks ago when we first saw the orbs. no further incidents on the way back to the marina. i do plan on taking the boat out more often to look for them, as you can see most hall of the island from where we were at tonight. camera will be in hand next time.
content.summary: Three orange orbs over oak island numerous times

content.detailedDescription: I went out to have a smoke and looked up and saw a thing covered in smoke with no smoke trail and when i kept looking i saw explosions happening i called the fbi and left a message no answer came until the news said we had a near miss headed from east to west cant remember it could of bin west to east but it came fom the north heading south
content.summary: It was exploding but still moving and not going down no smoke trail

content.detailedDescription:
Camping with fam. & friends at lake del val in livermore ca.  got to the lake at 11 pm. me & friend start seeing sattlelights  moving in a grid pattern of 3 to 4. we started getting bites, i asked what time it was, & it was a little after 1 am. saw lights in the distance & said that plane is flying low. when it got closer i could see a red light surrounded by white lights in a shape of an inverted triangle.  when it was overhead i couldn't see the front lights it slowwed down the shape was a triangle. the only sound was a low hum pulsating.It moved off slowly over the hills behind us. about 1 hour later to the sky in the west, saw something shoot up into the sky so fast that was
 a solid white light then hovered all night long.. i thought it was millitary from larence livermore lab going to concord naval weapons depot
content.summary: Fishing with friend, lights in sky, thought it was a plane, got closer no sound, triangle shape & lights saw second ufo later

content.detailedDescription: At 6:57 pm traveling from charlotte nc to west palm beach i was taking pictures of planes shadows on the clouds at 36,000 ft above savanah ga.. i know this because piolot had just made announcment.  i observed a shpere  heading  on parralel course about 50 yards off to the left side of plane !!  it was traveling in oppisite direction of the plane... i when we landed i asked the pilot if he had witnessed anything at that time ater his announcement...  he said no.. but  he asked me a few questions which led me to beleive otherwise.
content.summary: I saw a shpere traveling oppisite direction while on flight over savanah ga

content.detailedDescription: One night in october, i was sitting in my friends driveway smoking a cigarette. i noticed jupiter was super visible so i decided to take some pictures with my phone. i just started snapping away and didn't notice anything unusual. i was on a quiet suburban street with no unusual lights or anything out of the ordinary. after a few minutes i got a weird feeling and i went inside. the next morning i went through my pictures and found these. please note that i did not move my phone while taking these pictures and i saw nothing while taking these pictures that could explain them. i'm sorry for the vague description,  i'm just really hoping you guys will help me figure out what these are
content.summary: Captured some weird photos

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear day with a few white clouds overhead. i was on the roof of the business i worked at and as i looked at the clouds i saw a silver (or reflective) sphere come (horizontally) from behind a cloud. it stopped and did not move for about five seconds then it went backward (still horizontally) and slipped behind the same cloud that it appeared from. this happened in south charleston wv around 2001.
content.summary: Silver (or reflective) sphere

content.detailedDescription: I live on the top of hill. if you go down the hill about a block in distance you lose about 400 feet in elevation and come to the houses below me. the night the power was off all over the south west the houses below me had their power come on about 9:30 pm. at about 12:20 am a coyote was barking out side. i have a clock that projects the time on the ceiling and noticed our power was still out. i got up and stepped outside. i noticed three red lights moving below and thought "that's the power company trucks working on getting the power back on." although i didn't think there was a road where they were i thought they were off road trucks. i did a closer look and walked to the edge beside a giant rock we have in out back yard(about 15 feet from the house) where i could see all the way down and noticed the red lights were in a perfect triangle (about 10 or fifteen feet apart)and moving together counter clockwise slowly and going north slowly. to my surprise there were three more red lights in a perfect triangle following the first three about a hundred feet back from the first group. there was another three higher than me that i had to look up slightly too. they were arching down and joined the second set about a hundred feet behind the second set. all three sets were going the same speed and rotating counter clockwise as if they were joined together although i couldn't see anything joining them. about then the first three were going north out of sight as the hill juts out and blocked my view. the second set of three then made a move like they got on a ferris wheel and made one rotation which gave the third three enough time to fall in line about a 100 feet behind and the second three. then they  continued on the same path as the first three lights had done. i would guess they were traveling about a 100 high and the third three were about 400 feet high when i first saw them. i thought later they were going right where the power was on on one side and off on the other. i don't think we ever got a clear explanation why the power went off. i know it was about 12:20 am as our power came on about 12:40 and as i laid in bed i thought that happened about 20 minutes ago.  jd
content.summary: 3 ufo's of red lights in a perfect triangle the night the power was off all over the sw

content.detailedDescription:
I was a small child maybe 3 to 4 years old.  i awoke to see 3 small beings at the end of my bed.  they were 2 1/2 to 3 feet tall and a dark blue/purple color.  they had long arms with 3 long fingers with possible ability to use suction.  they did not look like any drawing i have ever seen of aliens.  i could only see the tops of their heads and their arms.  there did not appear to be any neck, and the head was wide and somewhat pointed on the top.  i could not move, i was paralyzed while they communicated with each other.  they seemed to be communicating using their minds.  when i thought, "why are my parents not helping me" i got an answer in my head "they cannot sense that we are here."  it was almost like they were working in a different dimension, or they had altered the regular world's ability to sense them.  there was a very bright door shaped light in my room.  i could tell that they were going to take me somewhere and i had no control.  i also could sense that i would be returned, and i would not be hurt.  when i thought that i was scared, and i did not want to go, they made feel that i had no choice, and that it was really for my own good.  i remember thinking that i was lucky that it was not the "other one's" like there were a different kind that would hurt those they took.  it was almost like i was somehow being marked as property, and i had been chosen to be saved from the "other ones."  i slept in the middle of my double bed every night after that because they were so short that i thought if i laid in the middle of the bed, they may not be able to reach me, and they would not take me away again.  

i have always said that if aliens are real than i was abducted by them when i was very small.  if they are not real, then i had one crazy realistic dream. there were concepts i could not have imagined or known about as a small child such as communicating via telepathy, alternate dimensions, and levitation.  it is hard to know what this really was because i was so little at the time.  

as weird as it may sound, i am skeptical about aliens and that memory.  it is so much different than anything i have every heard reported, that i do have to wonder what else it may have been.  

i have only ever told this to a few family members.  i am curious what others may have to say about it.  my family all thinks it was the active imagination of a small child or a bad dream.  

i don't know the exact date or time since it was numerous years ago.  i don't really want to be contacted, i am a very private person.
content.summary: Abduction?

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking down our driveway to our horse barn when i just happened to glance up, the evening seemed very quiet, but other than that, i don't recall anything unique that caused me to look up. 
as i was walking up to the barn i noticed a large, triangle shaped object flying slowly above me and the barn. there were 3 lights coming from it - they were not bright, but they were there - one at each tip. the craft emitted no noise at all. it simply flew slowly along. 
i saw the object, and continued into the barn... it wasn't until i was inside the barn that i thought "that was rather odd." and i went back outside. in the span of maybe 15 seconds - whatever it was, was gone. i initially thought it was probably just one of the stealth bombers from whiteman afb. they are known to do training runs around the area and it is not unusual for someone to report seeing one around. 
however, i feel like this object was moving much too slow; and was not really the correct shape. it was almost hovering, but not quite. a rough estimate would be less than 50mph (without knowing its true distance above me or the actual size, i'm not sure) ... it was moving northward over the barn and our powerlines to the barn. once i went into the barn, and then back out, there was still no noise. 
other than the intense quiet, nothing seemed amiss.. the horses did not seem disturbed, nor any of the other creatures on the property (dog and cats). 
i have tried to write this off as having been a stealth bomber for many, many, many years... but the more i think on it, the more i feel that if i truly believed that, i wouldn't still be contemplating this. to my knowledge, the stealth bombers are more of an oblique triangle... this was more equilateral than that. 
once the object was gone, i went about whatever had brought me down to the barn in the first place, telling my parents and a few friends about the event, all of which agreed it could have been a stealth bomber, but agreeing we did not believe they could move that slowly. 
we lived at that address for about 7 years - this was the only time this ever happened to me, or that i am aware of.
content.summary: Silent triangle object flying slowly, and low overhead

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was on 4th of july 2013 in a town called mustang in oklahoma my husband, brother in law and a couple friends we all took our kids to set off fireworks in this park. there were a lot of people there as well. i know a few others saw this as well. it just got dark and we started to set off our fireworks we set the first ones off and and just in the break of our next round, i was looking towards this building i think it was to the west,coming over this building was this red circular orb flying towards the east,i said to everyone look at that it wasn't something i  have ever seen before it slowed right down to a stop it hovered for about 30 seconds to 1 minute it was just bigger than the biggest star with no flashing lights and no sound that i could hear but there was a lot of fire works going off so if there was sound i probable drowned out. then it just started to move towards the east again then it changed direction and headed north at same speed then suddenly it took off over the trees out of sight in a blink of an eye
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red, circle, glowing orb flew up then slowed down to  a stop then hovered then flew off in a different direction

content.detailedDescription: We were sailing a 65 ft sailboat from san francisco to san diego for the america's cup 1995.  we were approximately 25 to 35 miles off shore somewhere around big surprise area. it was a clear cloudless night approximately 8- 9 pm.  the captain suggested we keep a watch out for a weather buoy before he went below deck to sleep.  there were 3 of us in the cockpit when we observed on the horizon (hard to know size & distance because we had no reference points) a round object pulsating deep red to orange, appearing to be sitting on the water. we thought at first glance weather buoy??? for a number of minutes we observed it just hovering and or sitting in the water pulsating knew then it wasn't a buoy.  the object then ascended at a speed i had never before witnessed.  it was as if one second it was in front of us and the next second it was up in the stars impossible to follow it happened in a nano second. it made no noise that i could hear. we discussed what we had seen and we all agreed we had seen something which was extraordinary, and most likely not of planet earth.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 25 miles off shore while sailing south to san diego we observed this ufo
content.locationName: San Luis Obispo - Big Sir, California

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dog outside to go potty. i do this 4 or 5 times a day. it was around four o'clock pm . it was a clear day no clouds. i had walked over to a pic nic  table and sat down. my dog is a small dog she is a yorkie. so because i live in the country , i watch for red tail hawks , and owls. that day i was watching some turkey vouchers. they were using the heat raisers to get way up there. there were 4 or 5 very high up. i could watch them with just my eye sight , but at times i would loose them for a few seconds, so i went in the house and got a pair of  binoculars. 7x 50 i think. i went back to the pic nic table and started watching them again. it was at this time that up above the birds that i was watching. that i saw the first one the bird was in the fram of view in the binoculars and up above the bird was a silver round ball , i am just guessing but to me it would be the size of a small cars hood. it moved in any direction it wanted to . it would stop then go again and just hang there in the air. 
 this got me on my feet and i walked to the east in my yard , i wanted to see it better . like the birds i would loose it for a second and then find it again. i pulled back the field of view to see where it had gone it was at this time i saw them all. at one time i could see 7 of them, all moving in and around each other . some would go out side of where the others where and then come back. at times i could count 9 but i am not sure because when some of them were moving out side the group they were going away from me and i would lose sight of them. silver balls , like the sun was reflecting off them , so i would say that they were metal, or polished metal. there may have had a line around the center of the shape but i am not sure if that is the right way to explain that. it was a thin dark line at the center , and i only saw that on one or two of them , and it was for a very short time , it was when they would move , i would think that i could see this line just as they were starting to move from a hovering stop. to me it seemed like they were playing all most. just getting close to each other and then going away from each other , staying in an area the size of a football field in the air. at this time my phone gave me an alert. and like a light bulb , i thought try to take a pic of them , and so i did . i took two pics of the sky where they are at , i could see them with the naked eye but not in the phone , it was to bright to see the screen on the phone so i placed the phone in zoom and snaped to pics. i am sending them both. you have to zoom the pics to see what i saw . but the photo's do not do what i saw justice. in the photo without the moon in it. in the bottom right corner is the clearest i have . it looks dark in the photo, but i will say what i saw was all silver balls , i don't know why that one looks darker . some just look like silver balls off in the distance . i wish the photos came out better so anyone could look at them and see what i saw. 
 i have lived in nebraska and saw military things that were not out yet. like the square smoke jet, i saw that jet years before it was out.
  this was not like that. this scared me and got me excited at the same time . i have never seen anything like this that moved so fast so easy. 
 in fact i would call my self a  non believer in u.F.O 's before this .
now i can say that i have seen something that i can not explain
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen 7 to 9 silver spree's moving then not , very fast , no sound , size of a small car hood
